results.question: Hi, can you tell me about myself?
results.answer: My name is Varun and I'm a finalier student at Jane University.

results.question: Why did you choose to apply for this role?
results.answer: I was really excited for this job and I think that I can do well here.

results.question: What are your key strengths?
results.answer: I am good at coding and I like playing football.

results.question: Can you describe a time when you showed a challenging problem?
results.answer: I have not faced a lot of challenges.

results.question: How do you deal with tight deadlines?
results.answer: I like to prioritize my work and work on the things that need my focus the most.

pros: • "I was really excited for this job and I think that I can do well here. I am good at coding and I like playing football," she said.
cons: • "I have not faced a lot of challenges. I have been very lucky," he says. "I have been lucky to have had a good life so far"
